== U+1 Testing Activities Planner ==

This page contains an Activities Planner publishing Ubuntu software testing opportunities for the members of the U+1 Testing team and others who wish to share in testing the Ubuntu development branch.

------

I will focus on making a usable Planner then try to make it pretty. At the moment I see 3 types of Ubuntu testing. There may be other types of testing that I am not aware of. 

* Testing that runs for a ''limited period'', such as pre-alpha 1 ISO testing.
* ''Regular'' or on-going testing, such as daily ISO testing.
* ''Coordinated'' testing where groups of U+1 members test fixes and work-a-rounds.

The idea of the Planner is to give advance notice of testing needs of the Ubuntu development community which can then become testing opportunities of the U+1 testing team and any wish to join in.

My purpose is to create a template Activities Planner that can be edited with the testing information as we obtain it. To work!
